comment.author: 18874793@N00
comment._content:
A Vought-Sikorsky Kingfisher, given the date most likely an OS2U-3 .
Powered by a Pratt and Whitney R985 AN-2 Wasp Jnr radial piston engine.
Max speed 164mph, cruising 115mph service ceiling 13,000ft range 805miles.
One fixed forward firing 0.30in and one rear firing 0.30in plus two 100lb or 325lb bombs on underwing racks.

comment.author: 21318003@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called IRON WORKS PHOTOGRAPHY, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
